sentence: In the Aps you can see some of the amenities that come with a stay at Le Blanc you do not need to be a guest to get into the Aps –

The service is beyond compare the amenities second to none the food was varied and outstanding and despite it being spring break week for college kids the tranquility was never compromised from the clamor in the nearby hotels
At present they are separated so if you go as a couple you have to each use a different area which stopped us from using this facility2
This resort is more quiet and relaxing than most with classical live music in the lobby each evening and a pleasant lack of loud music at the pool during the day
As soon as we walk though the lobby we once again are haggled about attending the “ Time Share Sales Presentation ” at this point I just about had it
You will read about Guilermo at the lobby bar stop by and meet him you will understand what a gem he is

try it at least once I guess but I do not think we will eat there on our next trip to LeBlanceven though there is an unbelievable breakfast buffet available on the lobby level we like to have breakfast at the 3rd floor pool where Jacinto is thejefe
Be sure to check out and use their Hydro Facility which is complimentary
So the lobby bar if you want a fabulous Martini just ask Francisco
They would not let us lift a finger
The staff explains all the amenities thoroughly and provides information on local attractions
The spa was spectacular and the exercise room offered top notch equipment

Special mention to Marine Billy Joel and Edie as fun and talented bar tendersThe rooms are a bit small for a hotel of this caliber but the bedding shower TV and amenities well stocked fridge Bulgari soaps are all great
The room was very nice the facility especially the pools were excellent all situated on the best section of beach on the entire Cancun hotel zone
The resort itself is incredible and the amenities spa especially are just completely over the top
When we arrived at the entrance to Asia hostess Corina always made us feel welcome with her warm and friendly greetings
The staff and amenities exceed expectations
Amazing amenities very clean safe and many options for things to do and eat
This is one of the nicest gyms I ’ve seen at a resort Room Our Royal Honeymoon Suite had the configuration we wanted with the tub NOT in front of the window the room was one level
Service food location accommodations
